TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the border styles that can be applied to the cells of a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control returns an object of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>, which has properties of type DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to customize the borders of the upper-left cell. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#12](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_53_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#12](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_53_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: A single-line border containing a raised portion.
